Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Gigantomachia
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The war upon the gods is declared. Trembling and cowing in fear false gods sense the rattling of spears forged for the armies the giants. The will of false pretenders withdraw from the might of the giants who gather in ever greater numbers.
Recruitment limit in friendly dominion +1, dominion gains a +3 conflict bonus, Mekone and Phlegran giants recruitment cost -10
